com.atoito.clap.impl

Class NoExitEnvironmentHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atoito.clap.impl.DefaultEnvironmentHolder
      • com.atoito.clap.impl.NoExitEnvironmentHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnvironmentHolder

    public class NoExitEnvironmentHolder
extends DefaultEnvironmentHolder
    Environment holder set to avoid the System.exit in a Clap app. Useful for automated executions or tests.

    • Method Detail

      • canExit

        public boolean canExit()
        Specified by:
        canExit in interface EnvironmentHolder
        Overrides:
        canExit in class DefaultEnvironmentHolder
        Returns:
        if the current process can call System.exit. Probably it will be true for the actual application and false in tests.
